name: Mutant Fighting Cup
description:
MUTANT FIGHTING CUP: 6 TOURNAMENTS, 6 BOSSES, 29 CUSTOMISABLE GENES, OVER 4,000,000 COMBINATIONS, FIGHTS, ATTACKS, DEFENCE, HEALING, STRATEGY AND MORE FOR FREE

Your help is needed to create the Ultimate Mutant Fighting Champion!
Unlock, combine and splice your way to victory using your genetically engineered pet.
Raise him to be the greatest fighter the world has ever seen and battle it out over 5 continents.
Hone your skills in Europe, South America, Africa, Asia and North America before entering the World Cup for immortal glory.
Do you have what it takes to defeat all of the mutant fighter competitors?

FEATURES

+ Create your own mutant fighter with over 4 MILLION gene combinations available
+ 6 Tournaments to compete in across the world, over 5 continents
+ Balance your attack, defence, dexterity, healing and HP
+ Unlock and combine genes from the 29 available to create your own strategy
+ Choose your attacks wisely, sometimes a good offence is a good defence
+ Unlock special mutations like the Fira Aura and Toxic Cloud for devastating attacks

CONTENT

+ Dog or Cat base mutation
+ 29 Genes
+ 4 million+ combinations per character
+ 6 Tournaments
+ 5 Continents
+ 6 Bosses
+ Attack, Defence, Dexterity, Healing and HP
